title: is there any way to support the mods of the boards?
body:
i heard they are volunteer people who works on the boards for free. i just wanted to ask if there is anything we can do to support you guys.
{{sticker:galio-happy}}

replies.body: If you're following the rules and setting a good example, that's all the support we need! <3
stop making post so they have less to mod
If you'd like to help me out then you can help petition for the return of Dominion as a permanent game mode-no I'm just kidding (kinda).

> [{quoted}](name=Prandine,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=iLPhO1s8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-01T23:27:06.102+0000)
>
> If you'd like to help me out then you can help petition for the return of Dominion as a permanent game mode-no I'm just kidding (kinda).

where can i sign up???

> [{quoted}](name=onionsan01,realm=EUW,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=iLPhO1s8,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-10-02T13:31:29.076+0000)
>
> where can i sign up???

Well there is this thread I made about it a few months ago if that interests you: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/tWeVQepI-please-bring-back-dominion-as-a-permanent-game-mode
{{champion:267}} I like cupcakes and other small cakes.
